titles.title: A bill for the relief of Ivan Lendl.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.
Reported to House by House Committee on The Judiciary. Report No: 100-596.
Called up by House on Call of Private Calendar.
Passed Over by House Without Prejudice.
Passed Over by House Without Prejudice.

bill.summary: 4/12/1988--Introduced. Declares a named individual to have satisfied certain requirements of the Immigration and Nationality Act relating to eligibility for naturalization.
